conversion_verification.notes: Successful volumetric 3D extrusions clearly visible with shadowing and perspective.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent extrusion and isometric perspective. Interior volume is well-defined.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Layout fidelity is extremely high; room proportions and adjacencies match the 2D plan perfectly.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement and scale are highly accurate to the original architecture.

visual_clarity.notes: Strong structural clarity, but docked points for text/label contamination inside the 3D footprint.

detected_errors.description: Floor plan text labels (dimensions/room names) are floating over the 3D geometry.

summary: A highly accurate and geometrically faithful 3D conversion with exceptional structural fidelity to the source floor plan.
